Uses of Package
org.mcm.sws.wsdl

Packages that use org.mcm.sws.wsdl
org.mcm.sws The WSplan Semantic Web Service toolset.  
org.mcm.sws.annotation Provides for classes that capture the information of SESMA web service annotations. 
org.mcm.sws.pddl Provides for a PDDL parser and for various classes that capture the information of PDDL formulas. 
org.mcm.sws.wsdl Provides a WSDL parser that makes the elements of WSDL documents available via dedicated java classes. 
 

Classes in org.mcm.sws.wsdl used by org.mcm.sws
Operation
          This class models a WSDL <Operation> element (see also http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl12)
OperationBinding
          Abstract class to capture binding data for operations
Port
          A port defines an individual endpoint by specifying a single address for a binding.
SOAPBinding
          A SOAP Binding (See http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl#_soap-b)
SOAPOperationBinding
          Holds the SOAP specific information of an operation in binding if the binding used is SOAP.
 

Classes in org.mcm.sws.wsdl used by org.mcm.sws.annotation
OperationBinding
          Abstract class to capture binding data for operations
 

Classes in org.mcm.sws.wsdl used by org.mcm.sws.pddl
Operation
          This class models a WSDL <Operation> element (see also http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl12)
 

Classes in org.mcm.sws.wsdl used by org.mcm.sws.wsdl
Binding
          Abstract class to capture (service level-) binding data that can be found in all bindings
Message
          This class models a WSDL <Message> element (see also http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl12)
Operation
          This class models a WSDL <Operation> element (see also http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl12)
OperationBinding
          Abstract class to capture binding data for operations
Part
          This class models a WSDL <Part> element (see also http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl12)
Port
          A port defines an individual endpoint by specifying a single address for a binding.
PortType
          This class models a WSDL <PortType> element (see also http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl12)
Service
          A service groups a set of related ports together (See http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl#_services)
SOAPBinding
          A SOAP Binding (See http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl#_soap-b)
SOAPBodyDef
          This class captures the information of the soap:body element.
SOAPFragmentDef
          Captures the information stored in soap:header, soap:body, soap:headerfault elements in the soap binding/operation/input, binding/operation/output and binding/operation/fault elements.
SOAPOperationBinding
          Holds the SOAP specific information of an operation in binding if the binding used is SOAP.
WSDLDocument
          This class models the WSDL <Definitions> root-element (see also http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl12) and provides a parser method.
WSDLParserException
          Exception thrown during WSDL parsing.
